text: Abdoul Aziz Mbaye (18 October 1954 – 3 February 2021) was a Senegalese politician. He was Chief of Staff for President Macky Sall. He was appointed Minister of Culture on 29 October 2012. He was born in Dakar, French West Africa. Mbaye died of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Senegal on 3 February 2021, at the age of 66.Décès de Abdoul Aziz Mbaye de la Covid-19 : Fin de mission d’un diplomate et 1er Directeur de Cabinet du Président Sall ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Senegalese politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Senegal Category:People from Dakar
title: Abdoul Aziz Mbaye
